name: Country Story
summary:
A whole new Country Story!

You think you know Country Story? 
The game that gives you and your friends your very own beautiful farms, full of cute animals, magical trees and delicious crops? Well think again.
Country Story has gone through all kinds of changes.
It's still all those things but now it's so much more.
Come play and see what's new!
info:
• 开发: Playfish
  • 平台: Web
  • 游戏类型: SLG
  • 游玩人数: Single-player with multiplayer interaction.
  • 发行日期: July 29, 2009
  • 结束营运: December 1, 2011
  • 售价: Free
  • 官方网站: http://www.playfish.com/?page=game_countrystory
